description: This trap indicates that a connection has been established to the
specified SS7 gateway. Information provided by this trap includes
the name of the connected SS7 node, the name of the SS7 gateway
on which the node resides, and the type of SS7 service that has been
established (ISUP or TCAP).
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeConnectionEstablishedNotification SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeName s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeGatewayAssignment s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeServiceType s EXAMPL SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: The name of this SS7 Node instance.
variables.name: SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeName

description: The name of the SS7 Gateway to which this SS7 Node is assigned.
variables.name: SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeGatewayAssignment

description: The type of service supported by this SS7 node connection (ISUP or TCAP).
variables.name: SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeServiceType

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that an established connection to an SS7 gateway
has failed. Information provided by this trap includes the name of the
failed SS7 node, the name of the SS7 gateway on which the node resides
the type of SS7 service affected by this failure, and the reason why
the connection has failed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeConnectionFailedNotification SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeName s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeGatewayAssignment s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeServiceType s EXAMPL SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeStateChangeReason s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: The name of this SS7 Node instance.
variables.name: SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeName

description: The name of the SS7 Gateway to which this SS7 Node is assigned.
variables.name: SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeGatewayAssignment

description: The type of service supported by this SS7 node connection (ISUP or TCAP).
variables.name: SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeServiceType

description: The reason why this SS7 node connection has changed state.
variables.name: SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeStateChangeReason

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that an established connection to an SS7 gateway
has changed state. Information provided by this trap includes the name
of the affected SS7 node, the name of the SS7 gateway on which the node
resides, the type of SS7 service affected by this failure, the new state
of the node, and the reason for the state change.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeConnectionStateChangeNotification SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeName s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeGatewayAssignment s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeServiceType s EXAMPL SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeCurrentState i 1 SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeStateChangeReason s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeConnectionStateChangeNotification SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeName s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeGatewayAssignment s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeServiceType s EXAMPL SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeCurrentState i 2 SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeStateChangeReason s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: This trap indicates that a MTP state change event has been received from the
SS7 gateway, affecting the specified destination (or remote) point
code (DPC). Information provided by this trap includes the name
of the affected SS7 node, the name of the SS7 gateway on which the node
resides, the updated MTP state, and the DPC affected by this event.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeMtpStateChangeNotification SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeName s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeGatewayAssignment s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeServiceType s EXAMPL SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeMtpStatus i 1 SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeAffectedPointCode i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeMtpStateChangeNotification SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeName s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeGatewayAssignment s EXAMPLE SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeServiceType s EXAMPL SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeMtpStatus i 2 SONUS-SS7-SERVICES-MIB::sonusSs7NodeAffectedPointCode i 9999 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4
